snippet: Though Sunday’s game was a rout and a dud, the Super Bowl is so iconic an event that Fox was able to set viewership records even as the game’s intrigue faded.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column holds that although game between Seattle Seahawks and Denver Broncos was a rout and a dud, Super Bowl is so iconic an event that Fox was able to set viewership records even as the game’s intrigue faded.
lead_paragraph: Though Sunday’s game was a rout and a dud, the Super Bowl is so iconic an event that Fox was able to set viewership records even as the game’s intrigue faded.

headline.main: Super Bowl Again Proves Bigger Than the Game Itself
headline.print_headline: Super Bowl Again Proves Bigger Than the Game Itself
